title: Protection from Zika virus may lie in a protein derived from mosquitoes

title_detail.value: Protection from Zika virus may lie in a protein derived from mosquitoes

summary: By targeting a protein found in the saliva of mosquitoes that transmit Zika virus, investigators reduced Zika infection in mice. The finding demonstrates how researchers might develop a vaccine against Zika and similar mosquito-borne viruses, the study authors said.
